/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. A white van is parked on the side of the road, adding a touch of everyday life to the scene. In the distance, a tall radio tower stands out, punctuating the cityscape. The image is bathed in the warm glow of daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
